scripts.upload-build-cache: gsutil -m rm -R gs://libclangjs-turborepo-remote-cache/** && gsutil -m cp node_modules/.cache/turbo/** gs://libclangjs-turborepo-remote-cache
scripts.download-build-cache: rm -fr node_modules/.cache/turbo && mkdir -p node_modules/.cache/turbo && gsutil -m cp gs://libclangjs-turborepo-remote-cache/** node_modules/.cache/turbo/
